name: tracker-radar-wiki
description: Generation scripts and source for Tracker Radar Wiki

scripts.build-css: rm -rf docs/assets/css/*.min.css && cat docs/assets/css/*.css | postcss > docs/assets/css/style.min.css
scripts.build-all: npm run build-history && npm run build-search && npm run build-api-history && npm run build-css && npm run build-pages && npm run build-index
scripts.build-all-scratch: rm -r docs/assets/data/history/* && npm run build-history && npm run build-search && npm run build-api-history && npm run build-css && npm run build-pages && npm run build-index
